Login With Google User Name Password Confirm Password Sign Up Add 
 Image Settings
Hi! I'm Dananjaya Bandara, the developer of Agrosmart. 
 
I'm a Software Engineering student at NSBM University and a plant lover myself. 
 
Combining my two hobbies, I designed Agrosmart to simplify plant care tasks and bring the world of farming closer to everyone. 
 
Thanks for using it!
Wateria's development wouldn't have been possible without the help of this projects: 
 
Firebase API by google Firebase 
 
Model Trained with Teachable Machine API and TensorFlow lite API Powered by Tensorflow 
 
Icons and images designed by Freepik and published at Flaticon
Notifications Notify at Postpone for Delete data Licenses About You can postpone the watering reminders to be notified later in the day. Specify the delaying time to be used. You can assign the watering time. 
 But you can only possible up to 60 minutes. //image processing activity Not Detect your Plants? Create A Model Not Detect your Plants? Create A Model Select A Picture

Are you satisfied with these Results? By pressing okay will be continued with default settings.
press Compare for comparing with the sensors whether values are tallie with the outcome
Are you satisfied with these Results? Welcome to Agrosmart! üå± The Automated Smart Watering System app that helps you and your plants thrive. Watering Time : According to the sensors, one sensor that detects soil moisture is dry. We recommend watering the plant for at least 15 minutes. According to the sensors, the soil moisture is detected as wet. Therefore watering is not necessary. According to the sensors, all the sensors that detect soil moisture dry out. We recommend watering the plant for at least 35 minutes. It seems like you are a newbie, huh..üíÅüèª 
 Since you are new to the app, how about login first? Check every information of the field such as humidity, temperature, Light Intensity, soil moisture via your app.
